Topology_graphs.hex_no_rotation module

class CoBeLRL.spatial_representations.topology_graphs.hex_no_rotation.HexTopologyGraphNoRotation(modules, graph_info)

Bases: spatial_representations.spatial_representation.SpatialRepresentation

__init__(modules, graph_info)

This initializes and sets up the hex topology graph with no rotation.

Parameters

  • modules – A dictionary containing all employed modules

  • graph_info – Graph information containing start node, goal node and clique size

Returns

None

set_visual_debugging(visual_output, gui_parent)

This method set up the Visual elements for debugging in the output window.

Parameters

  • gui_parent – Output window

Returns

updateRobotPose(pose)

This function updates the visual depiction of the agent(robot).

Parameters

pose – the agent’s pose to visualize

Returns

None

sample_state_space()

This method generates a sample state space In this topology graph, a state is an image sampled from a specific node of the graph. There is no rotation, so one image per node is sufficient.

Param

None

Returns

None

generate_behavior_from_action(action)

According to the action provided (reset or other), generate the behavior.

Parameters

action – Contains the action to be performed

Return callback_value

A dictionary containing the current node

get_action_space()

With this method, we get the required action space. For this spatial representation type, the clique size of the topology graph defines the action space

Param

None

Returns

Defined space containing discrete points according to the clique size

class CoBeLRL.spatial_representations.topology_graphs.hex_no_rotation.HexTopologyAllocentric(modules, graph_info)

Bases: CoBeLRL.spatial_representations.topology_graphs.hex_no_rotation.HexTopologyGraphNoRotation

This class defines the Hextopology graph with no rotation

get_action_space()

Get the required action space. Actions are allocentric directions plus two rotations

Param

None

Returns

Defined space containing discrete points according to the clique size + 2 rotations

Returns

None

generate_behavior_from_action(action)

According to the action provided (reset or other), generate the behavior. Not reset: If next node is invalid node the agent stays in place else moves to the next node. If reset: The agent is placed at a random node.

Parameters

action – Contains the action to be performed

Return callback_value

A dictionary containing the current node

get_action_space()

Get action space according to the clique size of the topology graph

Param

None

Returns

Defined space containing discrete points according to the clique size

generate_behavior_from_action(action)

According to the action provided (reset or other), generate the behavior. Not reset: Moves forward according to the action provided (0,1,2) If reset: The agent is placed at a random node.

Parameters

action – Contains the action to be performed

Return callback_value

A dictionary containing the current node

get_action_space()

Get the required action space

Param

None

Returns

Defined space containing 3 discrete points
